overlays.name: Webcam
overlays.css: .webcam-container { width: 100%; height: 100%; } .webcam-video { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; }
overlays.js: const video = document.querySelector('.webcam-video'); navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ video: true }).then(stream => { video.srcObject = stream; }).catch(err => console.error(err));

overlays.name: Score Bar
overlays.css: .score-bar { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); color: white; font-family: sans-serif; }
